llm_res.rule: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
The `approve` function should return a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. It is expected to return `true` on success.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
The `decimals` function should return the number of decimals the token uses. This is typically a constant value like 18, to represent the smallest unit of the token.
